name: Luna's Music Box
description:
A small puzzle game for the Music Game Jam 2018.  Use a controller, WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

I wanted to make a kind of escape room game for musicians, so I came up with 3 music related of puzzles. Two of them are solvable without music theory, but the third one may need some basic knowledge of chord progressions.

The game was built using Unity.

- The characters models and animations were taken from an old project.

- Textures and candles were taken from the asset store and altered to fit the game aesthetics.

- Levels were made using Pro-Builder.
